transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello? Hello. Ha hello. 
Customer: Hi sir very good morning Namaste.
Executive: Ha Namaste good morning. Yashwant sir main Amit baat kar raha tha Rahul ke senior head sir. Abhi sir aapka char tarikh main India Mart date office Noida se baat kar raha tha Delhi head office se. 
Customer: Ha boliye boliye.
Executive: Sir aapki profile hai Shri Krishna construction ki sir India Mart se. Asha karta hu sir sara cheez sahi chal raha hoga sir. But sir abhi aap se na main keh raha hu sir aap se Shri Krishna construction ki profile hai aapki India Mart se sir. 
Customer: Ha ha. 
Executive: Asha kar raha hu sir sara cheez sahi chal raha hoga lekin abhi aapka sir Rahul se baat hui thi sir char tarikh ko aap se hai na. 
Customer: Ha. 
Executive: Kuch kuch cheezon ko lekar lekin aapne ek feedback diya hua hai sir not satisfied ka main jaan sakta hu sir kya dikkat aa rahi hai aapko. 
Customer: Wo kya hua sir mujhe maine ek lead purchase kiya tha. 
Executive: Okay.
Customer: Ha to lead purchase kiya to wo samne wale matlab hamara sab baat ho gaya. Sab rate ko lekar sab product ko lekar baat ho gaya sab done ho gaya. 
Executive: Okay.
Customer: Magar jis din payment ka baat aaya to us din kya hua wo samne wala pehle bola ki matlab army se bole hum to humne bola theek hai koi dikkat nahi hai hum product bhi de denge aapko to bole ki hamara kuch rule hai bole hamara kuch protocol hai to bole humne bolo. 
Executive: Ha.
Customer: Wo bole ki aap kya karo pehle panch rupay hame send karo wo payment aapko return aa jayega. Theek hai bola panch rupay ki kya badi amount hai humne panch rupay send kiya hum return aa gaye. To baad me wo bola ki ab kya karo aur ek hamara rule hai ki aap thoda bada amount transfer karo humne bola kitna karna hai to bada 2499 bole to 25000 karne ka hai. 
Executive: Ha.
Customer: Humne to bola sir itna to hum nahi kar sakte ye hamare rule me nahi hai. 
Executive: Ha.
Customer: Unhone bole itna karoge to ye hum aapke sath deal kar payenge ye hamara protocol hai ye hamara rule hai army ka aisa waisa. 
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Baad me humne nahi kiya fir usse humne cancel kara fir kya kara hamare bhai ne ek bar mujhe call kiya matlab maine unko call kiya unhone bole ki ek bar call karo. To unhone call kiya us aadmi ko to wo aadmi ne matlab wo fraud tha pura. 
Executive: Ha ha. 
Customer: Ab samajh rahe ho na. 
Executive: Main aapko na ek main bilkul samajh gaya aapki baat main aapko ek request karna chahunga so sorry sir aapko ye problem face karna pada uske liye. But sir na aap kabhi bhi na online ke platform me agar aap deal karna chahte ho sir advance me aap jab tak ya to samne aisa hota hai na ki advance me kam kariye. 
Customer: Main aapko bhi ye kyu bata raha hu malum hai kya sir kyuki aap India Mart ka jo platform hai bahut acha platform hai agar isko aise agar logo ne hack kar liya to iska aapka naam pura. 
Executive: Bilkul bilkul uske liye main samajh raha hu sir agar aap wo number hai na sir aap wo number hame de dijiyega merchant keh ke sir usko hum usko uska wo kara denge sir. Right? 
Customer: Main aapko main maine Rahul sir ko uska number bhi send kiya wala hai uska GST number bhi send kiya wala hai magar Rahul sir ne abhi tak kuch reply nahi diya isliye maine feedback aapko diya. 
Executive: Theek hai sir koi baat nahi dekho sir online ka platform hai multiple buyers aate hain yaha pe sir right. To wo jo problems aayi hai uske liye hum aapko bilkul wo aisa is type se problem na aaye hum wo chahenge sir aapko again. Lekin sir agar aapko kabhi bhi agar aisa lagta hai na ki agar aapko koi aisa bina usme advance me bol raha hai ya agar aapko pehle paisa ye sab jaise aapne abhi conversation hua tha aapka ek buyer se is type ke conversation me sir aap believe na kijiye I am requesting to you theek hai sir. 
Customer: Nahi nahi sir.
Executive: Hai na kyuki aap bhi online online ka. 
Customer: Leads ka bhi thoda problem hai jo leads mujhe chahiye thi waise leads nahi aa rahe sir bahut kam. 
Executive: Sir ek request karu main aap se. 
Customer: Ha boliye. 
Executive: Ek bar better hoga sir agar aap video meeting pe aa jayenge na main aapko kuch cheeze aur bhi discuss karna chah raha tha aap se so that ki hum proper se discussion kar lete hain taki aapko na jo problems aayi hai sir wo problem na aaye aur hum jo milke coordinate karte hain sir aage cheezon ko taki kyuki sir aap bhi humse jude hue hain hum bhi aap se jude hue hain taki hum aapko information proper provide kar paye sir ki kaise kaise cheezon ko better kar sakte hain kahan pe hame improvement ki need hai aur kaise hum usko improvement kar sakte hain hai na aap matlab aapka post kya hai. 
Executive: Main sir relationship manager hu yaha pe Rahul ke senior head hu. 
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Main aap bolenge to main aapko main aapko whatsapp me apna visiting card bhi share kar deta hu sir. 
Customer: Ha ji ji wo wo share. 
Executive: Aap line pe rahiye sir. 
Customer: Ji ji rahiye sir. 
Executive: Hai na. Main aapko kya karta hu sir suniye na. 
Customer: Kya sir? Hello. 
Executive: Main thoda bahar hu main aapko thodi der me call karta hu aap kya kariye aap mujhe aap share karke rakhijiyega. 
Executive: Sir aap kitne time tak free ho jayenge?
Customer: Main call kar dunga na sir aapka yehi number hai na. 
Executive: Nahi ye number se call nahi lagega aapko ye to company ka number hai actual me. Right? 
Customer: Kya karo sir whatsapp pe mujhe bhejo. 
Executive: Main call karta hu aapko theek hai to ek cheez main aap se puchna chahunga aur uska koi concern hai sir aapka to jo concern aaya tha sir main wo close kar sakta hu aapka sir wo aapne mujhe bataya uske liye aapne jo feedback diya tha just like. 
Customer: Ji ji ji close kar dijiye usme koi dikkat nahi hai main aap se baat karne ke liye mujhe malum tha agar main feedback agar unko ye cheez low diya to mujhe koi na koi to India Mart se call karega isliye maine low diya tha. 
Executive: Nahi koi baat nahi sir agar aapko aisi kuch problems aati hai na to aap Rahul se bhi baat kar lijiye ya unko bol dijiye ek bar apne senior se baat kar lijiye. 
Customer: Maine unko bola tha Rahul sir aadmi ko reply nahi hai isliye maine feedback unko de diya tha.
Executive: Theek hai really sorry sir aapko ye problem face karna pada main abhi aapko whatsapp pe hi karke main apna visiting card share kar deta hu sir aapko theek hai to so that ki aap jab bhi free hote hain ek bar aap mujhe please connect kariye hum proper discussion kar sakte hain sir hai na. Sure sir take care baki main aapka close karta hu sir concern theek hai. 
Customer: Theek hai theek hai. Okay take care sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer faced fraud while purchasing a lead.

- Leads are not as per requirement.



Resolution:

- Executive apologized for the fraud incident.

- Executive assured to block the fraud number.

- Executive requested a video meeting for further discussion.

- Executive offered to share his visiting card on WhatsApp.

- Executive closed the concern regarding the feedback.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will share details on WhatsApp.



Alert (If Any):

fraud

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- fraud, leads, video meeting, feedback, visiting card
